bug.author: RobertLucian
bug.summary: Lack of enforcement when # of local models > disk_cache_size
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Version</denchmark-h>
0.22 <denchmark-h:h4>Description</denchmark-h>
When the number of local models provided using the API spec is greater than the predictor.models.disk_cache_size, no enforcement is done at deploy time. An error should instead be returned.
